Translations.Text: Ye allahara dike da'oyata deya, satkarma kare ebam bale, ami ekajana ajnabaha, tara katha apeksa uttama katha ara kara
samana naya bhala o manda. Ja'oyabe ta'i baluna ya utkrsta. Takhana dekhabena apanara sathe ye byaktira sutruta rayeche, se yena antaranga bandhu.
E caritra tara'i labha kare, yara sabara kare ebam e caritrera adhikari tara'i haya, yara atyanta bhagyabana.
Yadi sayatanera paksa theke apani kichu kumantrana anubhaba karena, tabe allahara saranapanna hona. Niscaya tini sarbasrota, sarbajna.

Tamra nidarsanasamuhera madhye rayeche dibasa, rajani, surya o candra. Tomara suryake sejada karo na, candrake'o na; allahake sejada kara, yini egulo srsti karechena, yadi tomara nisthara sathe sudhumatra tamra'i ebadata kara.
Atahpara tara yadi ahankara kare, tabe yara apanara palanakartara kache ache, tara dibaratri tamra pabitrata ghosana kare ebam tara klanta haya na.

Tamra eka nidarsana e'i ye, tumi bhumike dekhabe anurbara pare ache. Atahpara ami yakhana tara upara brsti barsana kari, takhana se sasyasyamala o sphita haya. Niscaya yini eke jibita karena, tini jibita karabena mrtaderake'o. Niscaya tini sabakichu karate saksama.

Niscaya yara amara ayatasamuhera byapare bakrata abalambana kare, tara amara kache gopana naya. Ye byakti jahanname niksipta habe se srestha, na ye keyamatera dina nirapade asabe? Tomara ya iccha kara, niscaya tini dekhena ya tomara kara.
Niscaya yara kora'ana asara para ta asbikara kare, tadera madhye cinta-bhabanara abhaba rayeche. Eta abasya'i eka sam'manita grantha.
Ete mithyara prabhaba ne'i, samanera dika theke'o ne'i ebam pechana dika theke'o ne'i. Eta prajnamaya, prasansita allahara paksa theke abatirna.
Apanake to ta'i bala haya, ya bala hata purbabarti rasulaganake. Niscaya apanara palanakartara kache rayeche ksama ebam rayeche yantranadayaka sasti.

Ami yadi eke anaraba bhasaya kora'ana karatama, tabe abasya'i tara balata, era ayatasamuha pariskara bhasaya bibrta hayani kena? Ki ascarya ye, kitaba anaraba bhasaya ara rasula arabi bhasi! Baluna, eta bisbasidera jan'ya hedayeta o rogera pratikara. Yara mumina naya, tadera kane ache chipi, ara kora'ana tadera jan'ye andhatba. Taderake yena durabarti sthana theke ahabana kara haya.
